title: New: Wildarms – Full Hearts
content:
Having a sensually voiced woman spell out my name one letter at time is probably how I want my funeral to be, with lots of retired aspiring buzzbands crying in the pews, mourning the loss of their one chance at internet fame.

Anyway, slightly perverted daydreams aside, this debut track from NY-based producer Wildarms portrays everything that’s so bloody brilliant about the  current crop of electronic producers, never ceasing to simply settle on one genre, Full Hearts develops and blossoms on repeated listens. Choppy, ever-so bemusingly psychotic and undeniably interesting, Wildarms clearly enjoys his fair amount of hip-hop, yet refuses to be landlocked to any specific style. Check out Full Hearts below, as well as an interview with Dazed Digital.

Full Hearts is taken from his debut EP Clear Eyes, out 5 February.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
